name: Peanut Butter Milkshake V2
description: Quick peanut butter milkshake. I am finally deciding to release this recipe after my fiance says it is the best version yet. So an update on this recipe I have done a revision, and change to TPA Peanut butter (not the DX version) and used the base of my Nesquikness recipe.
author: PolarizedOath

reviews.text: I got the same thing from this as I get anytime I use capella's peanut butter...peanuts with peanut skin and a nice vanilla cream.  That's not a bad thing.  It's really a nice change from vaping tons of fruits and too-sweet desserts.
